content.question: Which of the following statements by one of Ms. Foxâ€™s students best demonstrates a high level of conscientiousness?

choices.label: I am typically nervous in situations where I am meeting new people.
I am always happy to work with a diverse group of people.
I enjoy eating new foods or going to places I have never been before.
I like to keep my study notes organized.

content.answer: I like to keep my study notes organized.

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
